<!--- # Research Areas -->

Our group conducts pharmacological research across four main areas:

## [Infectious Diseases Pharmacy Practice](research/infectiousdiseases.qmd)

Advanced analytics, machine learning, and computational approaches for pharmaceutical research and drug discovery.

## [Antimicrobial Stewardship](research/antimicrobialstewardship.qmd)

Robust statistical methodologies for analyzing complex pharmaceutical and health data with emphasis on causal inference.

## [Antimicrobial Resistance Epidemiology & Pharmacology](research/antimicrobialresistance.qmd)

Cross-disciplinary partnerships bringing together pharmacy, statistics, computer science, and clinical medicine expertise.

## [Human Gut Microbiome Dynamics and Host-Microbe Interactions](research/humangutmicrobiome.qmd)

Advancing transparent, accessible, and verifiable research practices in pharmaceutical sciences.
